var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#access-authorize
var.desc: The default node access model is authorize.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#access-open
var.desc: The default node access model is open.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#access-presence
var.desc: The default node access model is presence.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#access-roster
var.desc: The default node access model is roster.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#access-whitelist
var.desc: The default node access model is whitelist.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#auto-create
var.desc: The service supports automatic creation of nodes on first publish.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#auto-subscribe
var.desc: The service supports automatic subscription to a nodes based on presence subscription.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#collections
var.desc: Collection nodes are supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#config-node
var.desc: Configuration of node options is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#create-and-configure
var.desc: Simultaneous creation and configuration of nodes is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#create-nodes
var.desc: Creation of nodes is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#delete-items
var.desc: Deletion of items is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#delete-nodes
var.desc: Deletion of nodes is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#filtered-notifications
var.desc: The service supports filtering of notifications based on Entity Capabilities.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#get-pending
var.desc: Retrieval of pending subscription approvals is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#instant-nodes
var.desc: Creation of instant nodes is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#item-ids
var.desc: Publishers may specify item identifiers.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#last-published
var.desc: The service supports sending of the last published item to new subscribers and to newly available resources.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#leased-subscription
var.desc: Time-based subscriptions are supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#manage-subscriptions
var.desc: Node owners may manage subscriptions.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#member-affiliation
var.desc: The member affiliation is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#meta-data
var.desc: Node meta-data is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#modify-affiliations
var.desc: Node owners may modify affiliations.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#multi-collection
var.desc: A single leaf node can be associated with multiple collections.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#multi-subscribe
var.desc: A single entity may subscribe to a node multiple times.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#outcast-affiliation
var.desc: The outcast affiliation is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#persistent-items
var.desc: Persistent items are supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#presence-notifications
var.desc: Presence-based delivery of event notifications is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#presence-subscribe
var.desc: Implicit presence-based subscriptions are supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#publish
var.desc: Publishing items is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#publish-options
var.desc: Publication with publish options is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#publish-only-affiliation
var.desc: The publish-only affiliation is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#publisher-affiliation
var.desc: The publisher affiliation is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#purge-nodes
var.desc: Purging of nodes is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#retract-items
var.desc: Item retraction is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#retrieve-affiliations
var.desc: Retrieval of current affiliations is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#retrieve-default
var.desc: Retrieval of default node configuration is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#retrieve-items
var.desc: Item retrieval is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#retrieve-subscriptions
var.desc: Retrieval of current subscriptions is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#subscribe
var.desc: Subscribing and unsubscribing are supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#subscription-options
var.desc: Configuration of subscription options is supported.

var.name: http://jabber.org/protocol/pubsub#subscription-notifications
var.desc: Notification of subscription state changes is supported.
